statements: SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance WHERE student_id = 1

SELECT DISTINCT class_id FROM StudentAttendance
SELECT student_id, class_id FROM StudentAttendance ORDER BY attendance_date ASC
SELECT MAX(attendance_date) FROM StudentAttendance
SELECT AVG(class_id) FROM StudentAttendance
SELECT student_id, class_id, is_present FROM StudentAttendance WHERE is_present = TRUE
SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30'
SELECT MIN(attendance_date) FROM StudentAttendance
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id
SELECT student_id, SUM(class_id) FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id
SELECT AVG(class_id) AS avg_class_id FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id HAVING avg_class_id > 80
SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance WHERE class_id IN (101, 102, 103)
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS attendance_count FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id HAVING attendance_count > 5
SELECT student_id, MAX(class_id) FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY MAX(class_id) DESC
SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance WHERE student_id = 2 OR student_id = 3
SELECT student_id, class_id, is_present, attendance_date FROM StudentAttendance;
SELECT student_id, class_id FROM StudentAttendance WHERE is_present = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM StudentAttendance WHERE class_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance WHERE attendance_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT AVG(CAST(is_present AS INT)) AS avg_attendance FROM StudentAttendance;
SELECT student_id, class_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM StudentAttendance WHERE is_present = TRUE GROUP BY student_id, class_id;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM StudentAttendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT student_id, class_id FROM StudentAttendance WHERE attendance_date > '2022-09-01';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_attendance > 10;
SELECT student_id, MAX(attendance_date) AS last_attendance_date FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance, AVG(CAST(is_present AS INT)) AS avg_attendance FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_attendance > 5;
SELECT student_id, AVG(CAST(is_present AS INT)) AS avg_attendance FROM StudentAttendance WHERE class_id IN (101, 102) GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, class_id, MAX(attendance_date) AS last_attendance_date FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id, class_id;
SELECT student_id, MIN(attendance_date) AS first_attendance_date FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, SUM(CAST(is_present AS INT)) AS total_present, SUM(CAST(NOT is_present AS INT)) AS total_absent FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY student_id ORDER BY attendance_date) AS attendance_rank FROM StudentAttendance;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(DISTINCT class_id) AS classes_attended FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_date, LAG(attendance_date) OVER (PARTITION BY student_id ORDER BY attendance_date) AS prev_attendance_date FROM StudentAttendance;
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_date, LEAD(attendance_date) OVER (PARTITION BY student_id ORDER BY attendance_date) AS next_attendance_date FROM StudentAttendance;

SELECT student_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance;
SELECT class_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance;

SELECT class_name FROM class_details;

SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT * FROM class_details WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT student_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance WHERE class_id = 2;
SELECT MAX(student_id) FROM student_attendance;
SELECT AVG(student_id) FROM student_attendance;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM student_attendance;
SELECT DISTINCT class_id FROM student_attendance;
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM class_details;
SELECT class_name, COUNT(*) FROM student_attendance INNER JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id GROUP BY class_name;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance INNER JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance LEFT JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance RIGHT JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance CROSS JOIN class_details;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_attendance.student_id, class_details.class_name FROM student_attendance LEFT JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance, attendance_date FROM student_attendance GROUP BY attendance_date;
SELECT class_name, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM student_attendance JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id GROUP BY class_name;
SELECT student_id, class_name, attendance_date FROM student_attendance JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id WHERE attendance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, class_name FROM student_attendance JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id WHERE class_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT AVG(student_id) AS average_student_id, MAX(student_id) AS max_student_id, MIN(student_id) AS min_student_id FROM student_attendance;
SELECT class_id, class_name, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM student_attendance JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id GROUP BY class_id, class_name;
SELECT DISTINCT class_id, class_name FROM class_details WHERE class_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT class_id FROM student_attendance);
SELECT class_id, class_name, class_description FROM class_details WHERE class_id IN (SELECT class_id FROM student_attendance GROUP BY class_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5);
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT class_id, class_name, AVG(student_id) AS average_student_id FROM student_attendance JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id GROUP BY class_id, class_name;
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance WHERE class_id = (SELECT class_id FROM class_details WHERE class_name = 'Physics');
SELECT student_id, class_name, attendance_date FROM student_attendance JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id WHERE class_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT student_id, class_name, attendance_date FROM student_attendance JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id ORDER BY attendance_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT class_id, class_name, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM student_attendance JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id GROUP BY class_id, class_name HAVING COUNT(student_id) > 10;

SELECT class_id, class_name, SUM(student_id) AS total_student_id FROM student_attendance JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id GROUP BY class_id, class_name ORDER BY total_student_id DESC;

SELECT class_name, AVG(student_id) AS average_student_id FROM student_attendance JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id GROUP BY class_name HAVING AVG(student_id) > 50;
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM student_attendance GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(class_id) > 1);
SELECT class_id, class_name, attendance_date FROM student_attendance JOIN class_details ON student_attendance.class_id = class_details.class_id WHERE attendance_date = '2022-06-15';

SELECT class_name, class_date FROM class;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id;
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attendance.attended = true;
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attendance.class_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attendance.attended = false;
SELECT class_name, COUNT(student_id) as total_attendance FROM attendance WHERE attended = true GROUP BY class_name;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(class_id) as total_classes_attended FROM attendance WHERE attended = true GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, class_name, class_date FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN class ON attendance.class_id = class.class_id;

SELECT student_name, class_name, class_date FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN class ON attendance.class_id = class.class_id WHERE attendance.attended = true;

SELECT student_name, class_name, class_date FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN class ON attendance.class_id = class.class_id WHERE attendance.class_id = 2;

SELECT student_name, class_name, class_date FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN class ON attendance.class_id = class.class_id WHERE attendance.attended = false;
SELECT student_name, AVG(CAST(attended AS INT)) as avg_attendance FROM attendance GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT class_name, SUM(CAST(attended AS INT)) as total_attendance FROM attendance GROUP BY class_name;

SELECT student_name, class_name, class_date FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN class ON attendance.class_id = class.class_id WHERE attendance.attended = true ORDER BY class_date ASC;

SELECT student_name, class_name, class_date FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN class ON attendance.class_id = class.class_id WHERE attendance.attended = true ORDER BY class_date DESC;

SELECT student_name, class_name, class_date FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN class ON attendance.class_id = class.class_id WHERE attendance.attended = true LIMIT 10;

SELECT student_name, class_name, class_date FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN class ON attendance.class_id = class.class_id WHERE attendance.attended = true LIMIT 5 OFFSET 3;
SELECT * FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE student.student_name = 'John';
SELECT student.student_name, class.class_name FROM student INNER JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id INNER JOIN class ON attendance.class_id = class.class_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM attendance WHERE attended = TRUE;
SELECT student.student_name, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM student LEFT JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attended = TRUE GROUP BY student.student_id;
SELECT class_id, AVG(CAST(attended AS INT)) AS attendance_rate FROM attendance GROUP BY class_id;
SELECT student.student_name, class.class_name, attended FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN class ON attendance.class_id = class.class_id;
SELECT student.student_name, class.class_name, class.class_date FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN class ON attendance.class_id = class.class_id;

SELECT student.student_id, student.student_name, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM student LEFT JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id GROUP BY student.student_id HAVING total_attendance > 5;
SELECT class_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM attendance GROUP BY class_id HAVING total_attendance > 10;
SELECT student.student_name, AVG(CAST(attended AS INT)) AS attendance_rate FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id GROUP BY student.student_id;
SELECT class.class_id, class.class_name, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM class LEFT JOIN attendance ON class.class_id = attendance.class_id GROUP BY class.class_id;
SELECT SUM(CAST(attended AS INT)) AS total_attendance FROM attendance;
SELECT student_id, class_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM attendance GROUP BY student_id, class_id;
SELECT student.student_name, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id GROUP BY student.student_id HAVING total_attendance > 3;
SELECT student.student_name, MAX(CAST(attended AS INT)) AS max_attendance FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id GROUP BY student.student_id;
SELECT class_id, class_name, AVG(CAST(attended AS INT)) AS attendance_rate FROM class JOIN attendance ON class.class_id = attendance.class_id GROUP BY class.class_id;
SELECT student.student_name, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM student LEFT JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id GROUP BY student.student_id HAVING total_attendance < 2;
SELECT class_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM attendance GROUP BY class_id HAVING total_attendance < 5;
SELECT student.student_name, SUM(CAST(attended AS INT)) AS total_attendance FROM student JOIN attendance ON student.student_id = attendance.student_id GROUP BY student.student_id;
SELECT attendance_id, student.student_name, class.class_name, attended FROM attendance JOIN student ON attendance.student_id = student.student_id JOIN class ON attendance.class_id = class.class_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students;
SELECT class_id, class_name, class_teacher FROM classes;
SELECT * FROM attendance;
SELECT attendance_id, student_id, class_id, attendance_date FROM attendance;
SELECT log_id, attendance_id, student_id, attendance_status FROM attendance_log;
SELECT student_id, student_name, class_id, attendance_status FROM students JOIN attendance_log ON students.student_id = attendance_log.student_id;
SELECT class_name, class_teacher, attendance_date FROM classes JOIN attendance ON classes.class_id = attendance.class_id;
SELECT student_name, class_name, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id;

SELECT student_name, class_teacher, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN attendance_log ON attendance.attendance_id = attendance_log.attendance_id;

SELECT student_name, class_teacher, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN attendance_log ON attendance.attendance_id = attendance_log.attendance_id WHERE attendance_status = true;
SELECT student_name AS Name, attendance_date AS Date FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT class_name, COUNT(student_id) AS Total_Students FROM classes JOIN students ON classes.class_id = students.class_id GROUP BY class_name;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(class_id) AS Total_Classes FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT class_name, AVG(attendance_status::INT) AS Avg_Attendance FROM classes JOIN attendance ON classes.class_id = attendance.class_id GROUP BY class_name;
SELECT class_name, MAX(attendance_date) AS Latest_Attendance_Date FROM classes JOIN attendance ON classes.class_id = attendance.class_id GROUP BY class_name;
SELECT student_name, SUM(attendance_status::INT) AS Total_Attendance FROM students JOIN attendance_log ON students.student_id = attendance_log.student_id GROUP BY student_name;

SELECT student_name, class_name, attendance_date FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id ORDER BY attendance_date ASC;

SELECT student_name, class_name, attendance_date FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attendance_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT student_name, class_name, attendance_date FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, class_id FROM students WHERE attendance_status = True;
SELECT students.student_name, classes.class_name FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id;

SELECT students.student_name, classes.class_name, attendance.attendance_date FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id;

SELECT students.student_name, COUNT(attendance_log.log_id) AS attendance_count FROM students LEFT JOIN attendance_log ON students.student_id = attendance_log.student_id GROUP BY students.student_name;
SELECT students.student_name, classes.class_name FROM students, classes WHERE students.class_id = classes.class_id AND students.attendance_status = True;
SELECT student_id, AVG(attendance_log.attendance_status::int) AS avg_attendance FROM students JOIN attendance_log ON students.student_id = attendance_log.student_id GROUP BY student_id;

SELECT classes.class_name, SUM(attendance_log.attendance_status::int) AS total_attendance FROM classes JOIN attendance ON classes.class_id = attendance.class_id JOIN attendance_log ON attendance.attendance_id = attendance_log.attendance_id GROUP BY classes.class_name;
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM students, classes, attendance_log WHERE students.student_id = attendance_log.student_id AND classes.class_id = attendance_log.class_id;
SELECT AVG(attendance_status::int) AS overall_attendance FROM attendance_log;
SELECT student_name, attendance_date FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;

SELECT student_name, class_name, attendance_date FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, MAX(attendance_date) AS last_attendance_date FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_id, student_name, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attendance_date <= CURRENT_DATE;

SELECT student_name, SUM(attendance_status::int) AS total_attendance FROM students JOIN attendance_log ON students.student_id = attendance_log.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING SUM(attendance_status::int) > 10;

SELECT student_name, class_name, attendance_date FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT student_name, AVG(attendance_status::int) AS avg_attendance FROM students JOIN attendance_log ON students.student_id = attendance_log.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING AVG(attendance_status::int) > 0.8;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(DISTINCT class_id) AS num_classes_attended FROM students JOIN attendance_log ON students.student_id = attendance_log.student_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT class_name, COUNT(student_id) AS num_students FROM classes JOIN students ON classes.class_id = students.class_id GROUP BY class_name HAVING COUNT(student_id) > 5;

SELECT student_id, student_name, class_name, attendance_date FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id ORDER BY attendance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM classes;
SELECT class_name, class_date FROM classes;
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM classes WHERE class_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM attendances;
SELECT class_id, student_id, attendance_date FROM attendances WHERE attendance_id = 456;
SELECT class_id, student_id FROM attendances WHERE attended = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM instructors;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM instructors;
SELECT instructor_id FROM instructors WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM class_instructors;
SELECT class_id FROM class_instructors WHERE instructor_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance_log;
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_date FROM student_attendance_log WHERE log_id = 123;
SELECT student_id, attendance_status FROM student_attendance_log WHERE class_id = 456;
SELECT student_id, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM student_attendance_log WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT student_id, class_id, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM student_attendance_log WHERE student_id = 789;
SELECT class_id, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM student_attendance_log WHERE attendance_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, class_date FROM classes WHERE class_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendances WHERE attended = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT class_id FROM attendances WHERE attendance_date = '2023-02-15';

SELECT students.first_name, students.last_name, classes.class_name FROM students JOIN attendances ON students.student_id = attendances.student_id JOIN classes ON attendances.class_id = classes.class_id;
SELECT students.first_name, students.last_name, count(*) as attendance_count FROM students JOIN attendances ON students.student_id = attendances.student_id GROUP BY students.student_id;

SELECT students.first_name, students.last_name, classes.class_name, attendances.attendance_date FROM students JOIN attendances ON students.student_id = attendances.student_id JOIN classes ON attendances.class_id = classes.class_id WHERE attendances.attended = TRUE;

SELECT classes.class_name, instructors.first_name, instructors.last_name FROM classes JOIN class_instructors ON classes.class_id = class_instructors.class_id JOIN instructors ON class_instructors.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;

SELECT students.first_name, students.last_name, classes.class_name, student_attendance_log.attendance_date, student_attendance_log.attendance_status FROM students JOIN student_attendance_log ON students.student_id = student_attendance_log.student_id JOIN classes ON student_attendance_log.class_id = classes.class_id;

SELECT students.first_name, students.last_name, classes.class_name, attendances.attendance_date FROM students JOIN attendances ON students.student_id = attendances.student_id JOIN classes ON attendances.class_id = classes.class_id WHERE students.first_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT classes.class_name, instructors.first_name, instructors.last_name FROM classes JOIN class_instructors ON classes.class_id = class_instructors.class_id JOIN instructors ON class_instructors.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id WHERE instructors.last_name = 'Smith';

SELECT students.first_name, students.last_name, COUNT(attendances.attendance_id) as attendance_count FROM students LEFT JOIN attendances ON students.student_id = attendances.student_id GROUP BY students.student_id;

SELECT classes.class_name, COUNT(class_instructors.instructor_id) as instructor_count FROM classes LEFT JOIN class_instructors ON classes.class_id = class_instructors.class_id GROUP BY classes.class_id;

SELECT students.first_name, students.last_name, SUM(CASE WHEN attendances.attended = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as total_attended, SUM(CASE WHEN attendances.attended = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as total_missed FROM students LEFT JOIN attendances ON students.student_id = attendances.student_id GROUP BY students.student_id;

SELECT classes.class_name, AVG(CAST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM now() - attendances.attendance_date) AS INTEGER)) as average_days_since_attendance FROM classes JOIN attendances ON classes.class_id = attendances.class_id GROUP BY classes.class_id;

SELECT students.first_name, students.last_name, SUM(CASE WHEN student_attendance_log.attendance_status = 'PRESENT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as present_count, SUM(CASE WHEN student_attendance_log.attendance_status = 'ABSENT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as absent_count FROM students JOIN student_attendance_log ON students.student_id = student_attendance_log.student_id GROUP BY students.student_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) as unique_students FROM attendances;

SELECT instructors.first_name, instructors.last_name, COUNT(class_instructors.class_id) as total_classes FROM instructors JOIN class_instructors ON instructors.instructor_id = class_instructors.instructor_id GROUP BY instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT student_attendance_log.attendance_date, COUNT(*) as attendance_log_count FROM student_attendance_log GROUP BY student_attendance_log.attendance_date;
